name: Random Arba'in Hadith
author: Abu Aisyah

sections.description:
Show random Arba’in Nawawi Hadith with Indonesia Language version. Next update I will use another languange, espicialy English and others.

Requires

WordPress 3.3x or higher

screenshoot

See file screenshoot.png in plugin directory
sections.installation: Just activate the plugin then put the widget, and you can use it. It simplicity itself.
sections.faq:
Q : My Plugin didn’t work?
A : Check Your wordpress version

Q : Still,My Plugin didn’t work?
A : Put widget Arbain to your sidebar

Q : Why this plugin doesn’t use database?
A : Soon it will.
